title: Catalogued Resource schema
description: Metadata schema for a Catalogued Resource

accessRights.description: A rights statement that concerns how the distribution is accessed.

contentTheme.description: Topic: A controlled term that expresses the broad topical content of an information resource. Subject: A controlled term that expresses a topic of the intellectual content of an information resource.

dateCreated.description: The date on which the data was created or last updated.

description.description: A concise narrative of the content of an catalogued resource.

keyword.description: Uncontrolled terms (words or phrases) assigned to describe an information resource.

lifecycleState.description: The current state within the object's lifecycle

publisher.description: Theentity responsible for making the catalogued resource publicly available.

recordID.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to a catalogued resource within the catalogue.

resourceTheme.description: Topic: A controlled term that expresses the broad topical content of an information resource. Subject: A controlled term that expresses a topic of the intellectual content of an information resource.

securityClassification.description: An information security designation that identifies the minimum level of protection assigned to an information resource.

supplierID.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to a catalogued resource a third party (supplier's) system.

title.description: The full and formal name given to an information resource. A name given to the distribution.
